  • Method Details

    • getWithQuotedRef

      public static FieldReference getWithQuotedRef(CharSequence safeString)
      Create a FieldReference given an unquoted name. (Note: the name here is a misnomer: the name may have been quoted in SQL, but must be unquoted when passed in here.)
      Parameters:
      safeString - the unquoted field reference
      Returns:
      the field reference expression
